Package com.aevi.preferences

This package provides classes for shared settings between the Developer Platform and an app.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SharedPreferencesService
    The SharedPreferencesService class provides the apps with the ability to retrieve and store Settings that can be synchronised with the Acquirer's Device Management System.
    SharedPreferencesServiceProvider
    The SharedPreferencesServiceProvider class gives an entry point to initialize a SharedPreferencesService

    After the SharedPreferencesServiceProvider is connected, by using the AeviServiceProvider.connect(com.aevi.helpers.services.AeviServiceConnectionCallback) function, a AeviServiceConnectionCallback is returned containing the initialized service.

Package com.aevi.preferences Description

This package provides classes for shared settings between the Developer Platform and an app. The API is based on the Android Shared Preference interface and provides a getSharedPreferences function along with an SharedPreferences.Editor object to store any modifications. Please see SharedPreferencesServiceProvider on how to use this package.
